metadata.name: MicroCosmos A
metadata.description:
In inflationary cosmology theory, galaxies were originally microscopic quantum fluctuations which were blown up enormously during the inflationary period.

In this generative art work a Turing instability amplifies the smallest variations which become large scale structure as the space expands, generating a MicroCosmos.

This work is a video file of 2 minutes duration at 1080 by 1080 pixels and at 25 frames per second.
